channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1377] As a user, I would like to see "album artist", "disc number", and "compilation" in parsed MP3 and MP4 types
item.description: As a user, I would like to see "album artist", "disc number", and "compilation" in parsed MP3 and MP4 types
item.summary: As a user, I would like to see "album artist", "disc number", and "compilation" in parsed MP3 and MP4 types

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please accept this patch with the improvement. I needed these XMPDM fields for a project I am working on. I updated the source, unit test cases, and a few of the test resources to contain these fields.

Any chance you could upload the changed binary files to this issue? Sadly svn patches (unlike git ones) don't include binary files, so while we have your code changes, we don't have the test files needed run your tests

Hi Nick, I have attached the two MP3 files with new tags which go into the \tika-parsers\src\test\resources\test-documents directory. I forgot the patches don't include binaries. The m4a file already had AlbumArtist, Disc, and Compilation tags which were used in the MP4 tests.

MP3 parser changes applied in r1614610 and r1614615, with minor changes for whitespace / comments / consistency with other parts of the code, and some extra test checks

MP4 parser changes applied in r1614618, with minor changes for whitespace and removing debugging code

Thanks!

FAILURE: Integrated in tika-trunk-jdk1.7 #130 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-trunk-jdk1.7/130/)
Include the tool used to create the MP4 in the XMP output, fixes a TODO spotted while working on TIKA-1377 (nick: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1614620)

  • /tika/trunk/tika-parsers/src/main/java/org/apache/tika/parser/mp4/MP4Parser.java
  • /tika/trunk/tika-parsers/src/test/java/org/apache/tika/parser/mp4/MP4ParserTest.java
    Partial TIKA-1377 patch from Dan Becker, with changes - Extract more XMPDM data from MP4, with tests (nick: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1614618)

    Partial TIKA-1377 patch from Dan Becker, with changes - ID3v2 support for more keys, MP3 Parser support to use that, and tests (nick: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1614615)

    Partial TIKA-1377 patch from Dan Becker, with changes - add more XMPDM keys (in order), and add ID3v1 stubs for new tags which ID3v1 does not contain (in the same way as others) (nick: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1614610)
